item.description:
Ready for a really fun Volunteer event?

The Lazarus house needs our help wrapping gifts that have been donated.

Our services are needed from 10am-1pm sorting and wrapping gifts.

We know this is a very busy week for everyone, so if you would like to help but can not commit to a 3 hour block of time, just let the Organizers know what time frame you will be able to commit to.....all help is welcome and very much appreciated.

Please, serious RSVP's only for this event. It is crucial to the success of the program to be able to give the Lazarus house a definitive count of how many pairs of hands will be able to assist.

If you RSVP and then something comes up last minute or your running late, please call the Meetup Cell phone at (978-304-2811)

Hope to see you amongst the wrapping paper
Happy Holidays to all
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the 2nd Floor and look for your organizers
item.name: Wrapping Gifts for Lazarus House
